title: Isaac Asimov Presents The Golden Years of Science Fiction: 36 Stories and Novellas
description: First Series: 36 stories and novella by various authors from 1939-1940. Previously published as two separate works entitled Isaac Asimov Presents the Great SF Stories 1 (1939) and Isaac Asimov Presents the Great SF Stories 2 (1940) Authors include:Eando BinderRobert BlochNelson BondL. Sprague De CampLester Del ReyH. L. GoldRobert A. HeinleinJoseph E. KelleamHenry KuttnerMilton A. RothmanTheodore SturgeonJohn TaineWilliam F. TempleJack WilliamsonRobert ArthurIsaac AsimovHenry BatesOscar J. FriendWillard HawkinsFritz LeiberP. Schuyler MillerRoss RocklynneA. E. Van Vogt
author: Isaac Asimov
